quotes.quote: There is just one piece of jewelry that is equally becoming to everybody, lovely with almost every ensemble, appropriate for almost any occasion, and indispensable in every woman's wardrobe...long live the pearl necklace, true or false, from our first date until our last breath!
A woman needs ropes and ropes of pearls.
The pearl is the queen of gems and the gem of queens.
Pearls don’t lie on the seashore. If you want one, you must dive for it.
Give all your pearls, and the swine will make a pearl necklace, then run off. Don't show all your glory.
All art is autobiographical. The pearl is the oyster’s autobiography.
I feel undressed if I don't have my pearls on. My pearls are my security blanket.
As coal pressured into pearls by our weighty existence. Beauty that arose out of pain.
Love. It felt like a falling raindrop scatter on a trembling leaf then roll of its tip in a cascade of pearls.
Like a layer on a pearl, you can't specifically identify the irritant, the moment of the irritant, but at the end of the day, you know you have a pearl.
I'm pretty lost in becoming all this frost. Bitter, like winter. Strung out like a string of pearls.
Value them; they are pearls of great price.
At the edge of madness you howl diamonds and pearls.
